data.name: Jumping Horses Champions
data.detailed_description:
◆◆◆◆◆ Jumping Horses Champions is a game that mixes the arcade style with characteristics of simulation. The game brings the experiences and emotions of a show jumping match in an immersive environment. Managing the money and the stables, the player can buy horses, which have their own attributes, and participates in challenging events to test its skills.

◆ Interactive Mode!

Interactive mode where the player is free to walk around the farm while interacting with its horses and its surroundings.

◆ Customize your Character!

Customization system for the character.

◆ Horse Care!

The Player can look after its horses, grooming, hoofing and feeding them. It would improve their attributes to achieve better results in the events.

◆ Have a Pet!

Players can buy one or more Pets to accompany them while walking in the farm.

Features:

◆ 2 Competition Styles: Show Jumping and Cross-Country
◆ Free Riding in the Farm
◆ Grooming, Hoofing and Feeding
◆ Interactive mode in the Farm
◆ 90 unique horses to race
◆ 2 groups of horses (divided by level)
◆ 6 events
◆ System of buying and selling horses
◆ Reward system for each event
◆ Intuitive Controls
◆ Clean interface
◆ Breeding Horses
◆ Training track

data.short_description: Raise Horses Champions and Manage your stud farm in a fun and challenging game. Join the Show Jumping World!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD X8 FX-8350 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 710 or AMD Radeon HD 8570D or higher
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0, Ubuntu 18.04, Kernel 4.15 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD X8 FX-8350 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 710 or AMD Radeon HD 8570D or higher
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
